attributes.action: make religious education in all schools compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that a lot of religious based violence and bullying could be stopped if children were educated on the morals, customs and ethics of all the world's religions instead of having their education in that direction left at the mercy of unfair stereotypes. People are afraid of what they do not understand, religious education would provide understanding and encourage tolerance
